channel.title: [PI] Stop teleports while trading? Rep++
channel.description:
I use a Project Insanity base.
This is a simple question, yes I know, but I can't seem to find where I modify the actions of [code]c.getPA().startTeleport[/code]
You would think it would be in client.java, obviously because it has the c.getPA and c is defined as a shortcut for the client class, but I couldn't find it in client.java. Lol.
Base: [Project Insanity] Insanity-X
What I'm Asking: Where can I modify the actions of c.getPA().startTeleport? I know what to do from there, I just need someone to point me in the right direction.
Why?: I'm fixing a dupe for my server. -.- I had to remove the freaking ::train teleport command because of dupers. (Btw if you ever get dupers go to PM logs and search for files containing the text "dupe" Busted like 10-15 dupers. lol)
My Research: I've looked for fixes for this dupe, I couldn't find any so I just decided to do it myself, but then I realized I couldn't find where to modify c.getPA().startTeleport...Lol. So yeah, I have done my research, I just couldn't find anything. I have also tried doing this myself, so please don't think I'm asking for someone to do all my work for me.
Thank you! -Cloudnine

item.title: [PI] Stop teleports while trading? Rep++
item.dc:creator: @omfgamrange omfgamrange
item.description:
@omfgamrange wrote:

Just make an exception or something

c.getPA().startTeleport(cordx,cordy); { } else { c.isTrade = true; c.sendMessage("you cannot teleport while trading!"); }

dunno if that will work since I just came up with it from the top of my head but you know what im trying to say.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Stop teleports while trading? Rep++
item.dc:creator: @hotkid8200 hotkid8200
item.description:
@hotkid8200 wrote:

i don’t know what you’re 100% of asking for but i’m using insanityx v8 to help you out i found c.getPA().startTeleport in these files:

NpcHandler.java

ActionHandler.java

PlayerAssistant.java

Player.java

ItemClick3.java

commands.java (the ::train commands comes from here)

ClickObject.java

ClickItem.java

ClickingButtons.java

CombatAssistant.java

Read full topic
